Quick Start  
===========
iMSminer is available for quick start in Google Colab. Google Colab is a friendly interactive notebook run on Google Cloud and has most packages pre-installed.

.. _googlefolder:
Using iMSminer  
--------------
* Download folder to your Google Drive (https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/12Qjz5zlSMwL42W0X_yZxZVZaVXtlhylo?usp=drive_link)
* Open ``iMSminer_quickstart.ipynb`` for walkthrough in Google Colab
